article_title: Prayer, portrait will honor slain SC Sen. Pinckney’s life
article_text:
Portrait of slain senator to be unveiled Wednesday

S.C. Legislative Black Caucus, others to gather at State House in prayer

Lawmakers recall Pinckney’s commitment to health care

article_metadata.news-keywords: clementa pinckney, legislature, sc, politics, AME, Mother Emanuel, church, shooting, dylann roof, portrait, senate, house, charleston, church, massacre
article_metadata.description: Slain S.C. Sen. Clementa Pinckney had no way of knowing that his death would become the catalyst to furl the Confederate flag, ending that divisive debate. On Wednesday, lawmakers will honor Pinckney’s life and legacy with prayer and a portrait at the State House.
